body.text: We now require everyone to provide their date of birth to play CnR. Your date of birth will only be used for moderation purposes, and it's not visible to normal players. The data will be handled in line with our [Privacy Policy](https://sasinosoft.com/Privacy).

body.title: I declare that the provided date is my real date of birth and that my account may be terminated if it's not true, and I declare that I am an adult, or, I am 13 years old or older and I have the approval of my parents or guardian to play Cops and Robbers V.
